see gruntfile-html.js
-------without quotes
-------file: (./fixtures/replace1.txt)
<!--BUILD_HTML(./fixtures/replace1.txt)-->

-------with single quotes
-------file: ('./fixtures/replace1.txt')
<!--BUILD_HTML('./fixtures/replace1.txt')-->

-------with double quotes
-------file: ("./fixtures/replace1.txt")
<!--BUILD_HTML("./fixtures/replace1.txt")-->

-------with extra space
-------file: ("./fixtures/replace1.txt")-->
<!--     BUILD_HTML("./fixtures/replace1.txt")-->

-------with no space
-------file: ("./fixtures/replace1.txt")
<!-- BUILD_HTML("./fixtures/replace1.txt") -->

with html comments, no quotes, no space file: (./fixtures/replace1.txt)
<!--BUILD_HTML(./fixtures/replace1.txt)-->

-------with html comments, quotes, space
-------file: ( './fixtures/replace1.txt' )
<!--   BUILD_HTML( './fixtures/replace1.txt' ) -->

-------In a sentence
-------file: ("./fixtures/replace1.txt")
This part is permanent. THIS IS NOT: <!-- BUILD_HTML("./fixtures/replace1.txt")-->

-------Lower case BUILD_HTML
-------file: ("./fixtures/replace1.txt")
<!-- BUILD_HTML("./fixtures/replace1.txt") -->

-------Mixed case BUILD_html
-------file: (  ./fixtures/replace1.txt  )
<!--BUILD_html(  ./fixtures/replace1.txt  )-->

-------with space on both sides of quote
-------file: (  "  ./fixtures/replace1.txt  "   )
<!--BUILD_HTML(  "  ./fixtures/replace1.txt  "   )-->

-------with file that spaces in the name
-------file: ( "./fixtures/replacement file 01.txt" )
<!-- BUILD_HTML( "./fixtures/replacement file 01.txt" ) -->

-------with file that spaces in the name not using quotes
-------file: ( ./fixtures/replacement file 01.txt )
<!-- BUILD_HTML( ./fixtures/replacement file 01.txt ) -->

-------with file that spaces in the name not using quotes,
-------file: ( ./fixtures/replacement file 01.txt )
<!-- BUILD_HTML( ./fixtures/replacement file 01.txt ) -->

-------with file that spaces in the name not using quotes,
-------file:    ("./fixtures/replace3.txt")
-------optons:  [breakstring?flags=word]
<!-- BUILD_HTML("./fixtures/replace3.txt")
[breakstring?flags=word] -->

-------missing end --> should not be replaced
-------file: ("./fixtures/replace3.txt")
<!-- BUILD_HTML("./fixtures/replace3.txt")

-------improper <-- should not be replaced
-------file: ("./fixtures/replace3.txt")
<-- BUILD_HTML("./fixtures/replace3.txt") -->
